Name.BusinessNameLine1: NATIONAL ORGANIZATION FOR RARE DISORDERS INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: IMPROVE IDENTIFICATION, TREATMENT, AND CURE OF RARE DISEASES THROUGH PROGRAMS OF EDUCATION, ADVOCACY, RESEARCH AND SERVICE. IMPROVE IDENTIFICATION, TREATMENT, AND CURE OF RARE DISEASES THROUGH PROGRAMS OF EDUCATION, ADVOCACY, RESEARCH AND SERVICE.
IRS990.MissionDescription: IMPROVE IDENTIFICATION, TREATMENT, AND CURE OF RARE DISEASES THROUGH PROGRAMS OF EDUCATION, ADVOCACY, RESEARCH AND SERVICE.
IRS990.Description: PATIENT SERVICES-PROVIDES FREE OR LOW COST PRESCRIPTION DRUGS TO UNINSURED AND NEEDY PATIENTS OR PAYMENT OF THEIR HEALTH INSURANCE PREMIUMS OR CO-PAYS

Activity2.Description: EDUCATION-PROVIDE UNDERSTANDABLE INFO TO PATIENTS, FAMILIES AND THE MEDICAL COMMUNITY THROUGH PUBLICATIONS, NEWSLETTERS, BOOKS AND THE NORD RARE DISEASE DATABASE ACCESSIBLE ON THE INTERNET

Activity3.Description: ADVOCACY SERVES AS THE LIAISON BETWEEN THE RARE DISEASE COMMUNITY AND THE NATIONAL INSTITUTIONS THAT HAVE A DIRECT IMPACT ON THEIR HEALTH

GeneralExplanation.Explanation: UNREALIZED GAINS LOSSES ON BOOKS NOT ON FORM 990
REVIEWED BY CFO, CEO, TREASURER, FINANCE COMMITTEE, EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE AND CHAIRPERSON OF THE AUDIT COMMITTEE PRIOR TO BEING FILED.
BOD REVIEWS ALL CONFLICT OF INTEREST MATTERS AND DOCUMENTS WHEN APPROPRIATE.
BOD REVIEWS THIRD PARTY INFO AS WELL AS PUBLISHED SALARY RANGES
GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE POSTED ON NORDS WEBSITE.
SEE ATTACHED LIST FOR ALL STATES WHERE FORM 990 IS FILED.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990 Part III Program Service Accomplishments
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Program Service Expenses 144,881, Grants and allocations 0, Revenue 0 TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE-PROVIDE ASSISTANCE TO VOLUNTARY HEALTH AGENCIES AND SUPPORT GROUPS TO IMPROVE THEIR EFFECTIVENESS, COMPLIANCE WITH NON-PROFIT STANDARDS AND PROGRAM DEVELOPMENT

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990 Part III Program Service Accomplishments
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Program Service Expenses 334,468, Grants and allocations 0, Revenue 0 RESEARCH-PROVIDES ASSISTANCE THROUGH FUNDING OF VARIOUS RESEARCH GRANTS TO ACADEMIC SCIENTISTS DEVELOPING NEW TREATMENTS AND DIAGNOSTICS FOR RARE DISORDERS
